properties.title: Concierge OSGi - An optimized OSGi R3 implementation for mobile and embedded systems - Concierge on Sharp Zaurus
properties.author: Jan S. Rellermeyer

meta.name: description
meta.content: Concierge is an optimized OSGi R3 implementation with a minimal file and memory footprint, which makes it ideal for small and embedded devices.

section.name: Concierge on Sharp Zaurus
section.p:
Concierge has been tested with Sun's cvm on a Zaurus 5400. The syntax for starting Concierge is:
/home/QtPalmtop/j2me/bin/cvm -Djava.class.path=concierge-0.6.0.jar ch.ethz.iks.concierge.framework.Framework
